GetSentMessageByMessageId.description: Get information about a send request

parameters.messageId: Id of the send request to be retrieved type(String)

SendContentToRecipient.description: Send an OTT message to the recipient

GetSentMessagesCollection.description: Get information about collection of send requests (placeholder)

parameters.$pagesize: Page Size for paging default(50) type(Int32)

GetRegistrationPropertyById.description: Get information about a registered OTT property by Platform and ID

parameters.platform: Platform Name of the property type(String)
parameters.ottPropertyId: ID of the OTT property type(String)

parameters.$pagesize: Page Size for paging default(50) type(Int32)

parameters.platform: Platform Name of the property type(String)

GetRegisteredChannelUtilizationByProvide.description: Get information about the registered chat messaging channel and utilization count by provider

GetKeywordAvailability.description: Checks if keyword is available to use

parameters.keywordType: Keyword Type to validate.  0 = JB Chat Entry, 1 = JB Chat WaitUntil default(0) type(Int32)

CheckKeywordApplicability.description: Checks if the provided keyword exists in the ongoing journeys.

parameters.channelId: Id of the channel (Business Phone number) type(String)
parameters.keyword: Keyword to search in active journeys type(String)
parameters.secondaryKeyword: Keyword to search in active journeys type(String)
parameters.fromNumber: Mobile End User (MEU) phone number type(String)

LookupKeywordApplicability.description: Checks if the provided keyword exists in the ongoing journeys.

parameters.channelId: Id of the channel (Business Phone number) type(String)
parameters.keyword: Keyword to search in active journeys type(String)
parameters.secondaryKeyword: Keyword to search in active journeys type(String)
parameters.fromNumber: Mobile End User (MEU) phone number type(String)

GetMetaAppIdAndVersion.description: Get information about the meta app by provider name

GetWhatsAppWabaCollection.description: Get information about the registered WABAs by provider name

parameters.$pagesize: Page Size for paging default(50) type(Int32)

GetSupportedMessageTypes.description: Get the supported message type for WhatsApp templates

ReprocessWaba.description: Reprocess Waba to Sync With Meta

GetTemplateDetails.description: Get information about template against given Waba

GetFlowDetails.description: Get all the details for a specific flow
